adDetails: Pianist for Parties & Weddings www.HarryPiano.com Harry is a professional pianist that performs music for parties and weddings. He can provide a portable digital piano with speakers and a microphone for announcements or speeches. With the newest keyboard technology, Harry can even sound like a full band. Songs by Gershwin, Frank Sinatra, The Beatles, Elton John, Billy Joel, Coldplay, and all of the current Top 40 hits. samples and reviews Harry show contact info Available for events throughout the San Francisco SF Bay Area.
